title: Obagi System Professional-C  10% Vitamin C Serum, 1-Ounce Bottle (30ml)
description: Obagi Professional-C Serum provides antioxidant protection with deep penetration to the dermal layer.  The 10% L-ascorbic acid helps in defending against damaging UVA and UVB rays, helps prevent premature signs of aging such as fine lines and wrinkles, and contributes to collagen synthesis.  Obagi Professional-C Serum 10% is suitable for dry, sensitive or reactive skin.

title: Skinceuticals Sheer Physical Uv Defense SPF 50 Broad-spectrum Sunscreen Fluid, 1.7-Ounce
description: Sheer Physical UV Defense is a physical transparent sunscreen with true broad spectrum coverage from UVA and UVB rays. This unique formulation provides a non-irritating, ultra sheer texture for all skin types, even the most sensitive.

title: Deepshine Protective Oil Treatment by Rusk, 4 Ounce
description: Deepshine oil is a marine mineral-enriched argan oil treatment that smoothes the cuticle, eliminates frizz, and improves elasticity and hydration, leaving hair soft, silky and manageable. Deepshine oil is perfect for all hair types.
